item.title: Five killed, three injured in Raichur vehicle crash
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: Five people were killed, and three others were injured in a head-on collision between a pickup vehicle and a mini passenger vehicle near Kannari Cross on the Sindhanur-Siruguppa NH-150A road late Tuesday evening.According to police reports, all the victims were from Challekadlur village in Siruguppa taluk of Ballari district. The accident occurred around 8.45pm between the mini passenger vehicle carrying sheep and a pickup vehicle transporting steel.Sannayallaiah, 45, Ranganath Kallur, ...]]>
